subject: AI & Agents
title: The Sampling Debate Revisited
description: One-minute skill: The Sampling Debate Revisited.

hook.text: Hip-hop sampled old records and got sued. AI samples everything it's trained on. Same fight, bigger scale.

buildup.text: Sampling laws evolved after decades of legal battles in the music industry.

discovery.text: AI-generated music blends influences from thousands of songs into something statistically new.

twist.text: If AI generates a melody that sounds like a copyrighted song by coincidence, who's liable?

climax.text: Record labels are filing lawsuits against AI music companies. The outcome is uncertain.

punchline.text: Old fights, new technology, same unanswered questions.

quiz.question: Why is AI music generation compared to sampling?
options: Both blend existing works to create something new, raising copyright issues
